description:

He certainly thrusts his ass out for enough for Glenn to bury his face deeply in his ass. Can't wait to get him back in to see how much cock we can fit in there.
Glenn had last done an oral video with Braxton, who filled his eye with cum during the facial. Wren was down for a open-mouthed facial, thinking that it might get him over the top himself. That's pretty advanced for some who just dabbles in gay sex, so either he is has more than he lets on, or he was truly ready to get piggy with it.
Glenn was trying to be good about not getting cum in Wren's eye like Braxton did to him, and just like Braxton, the bulk of his cum splats him right in the eye!. A good amount gets in his mouth, forehead, neck, and even chest. He quickly realizes what he does and quickly scoops the cum out of his eye.
He is such a pro too. He can sense Wren is going to nut soon, so gets in there and massages his chest and helps him get over the top.
Wren did an amazing job, and I can't wait to get him back for more! I think I have another guy who can help out Servicing the new guys!
title: Glenn & Wren - Serviced
